de.wwu.muggl.vm
Class Application

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      de.wwu.muggl.vm.Application
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Application
extends java.lang.Thread

An Application is the top level element of any execution. it holds the reference to the virtual machine and the class loader. It will start the execution in a new thread and provide access to the results of the execution.

Version:
1.0.0, 2010-07-15
Author:
Tim Majchrzak

Constructor Detail

Application

public Application(MugglClassLoader classLoader,
                   java.lang.String initialClassName,
                   Method method)
            throws ClassFileException,
                   InitializationException
Basic constructor.

Parameters:
classLoader - The main classLoader to use.
initialClassName - The class that is to be executed initially.
method - The method that is to be executed initially. It must be a method of the class initialClassName.
Throws:
ClassFileException - Thrown on fatal errors loading or parsing a class file.
InitializationException - If initialization of auxiliary classes fails.

Application

public Application(java.lang.String[] classPathEntries,
                   java.lang.String initialClassName,
                   int initialMethodNumber)
            throws ClassFileException,
                   InitializationException
Basic constructor for initialization without an existing class loader.

Parameters:
classPathEntries - A String array of class path entries.
initialClassName - The class that is to be executed initially.
initialMethodNumber - The methods number in the class file that is to be executed first.
Throws:
ClassFileException - Thrown on fatal errors loading or parsing a class file.
InitializationException - If initialization of auxiliary classes fails.
Method Detail

run

public void run()
Starts execution within the initialized virtual machine. If the virtual machine has finished, check if there is a new instance of it waiting for execution.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread

abortExecution

public void abortExecution()
Aborts the execution in the virtual machine. This will only have consequences if the step by step mode is enabled.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - If cleanup has already been run and there is no more virtual machine present.

getExecutionFinished

public boolean getExecutionFinished()
Getter for executionFinished.

Returns:
true, if the execution has finished, false otherwise.

executionHasFinished

public void executionHasFinished()
Set executionFinished to true.

errorOccured

public boolean errorOccured()
Getter for the errorOccured field.

Returns:
true, if an error has occurred during execution, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - If cleanup has already been run and there is no more virtual machine present.

fetchError

public java.lang.String fetchError()
Fetch the error message generated by the execution, if there was any.

Returns:
The error message.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - If cleanup has already been run and there is no more virtual machine present.

getReturnedObject

public java.lang.Object getReturnedObject()
Getter for the returned object.

Returns:
The returned object from an execution.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - If cleanup has already been run and there is no more virtual machine present.

getHasAReturnValue

public boolean getHasAReturnValue()
Getter for the information whether a value was returned, or not.

Returns:
true, if a value was returned, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - If cleanup has already been run and there is no more virtual machine present.

getThrewAnUncaughtException

public boolean getThrewAnUncaughtException()
Getter for the information whether the return value can be treated as the actual return value of the method's execution (false), or if execution the method has resulted in an uncaught Exception being thrown (true).

Returns:
true, if the method threw an uncaught exception, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - If cleanup has already been run and there is no more virtual machine present.

getVirtualMachine

public VirtualMachine getVirtualMachine()
Getter for the virtual machine.

Returns:
The VirtualMachine.

setVirtualMachine

public void setVirtualMachine(VirtualMachine vm)
Setter for the virtual machine. This will abort execution in the virtual machine currently running.

Parameters:
vm - The new VirtualMachine.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - If cleanup has already been run and there is no more virtual machine present.

getVmIsInitializing

public boolean getVmIsInitializing()
Getter for vmIsInitalizing. It will return false if this Application has been finalized.

Returns:
true, if the vm has not yet been fully initialized and is not finalized, false otherwise.

newVMHasBeenInitialized

public void newVMHasBeenInitialized()
Set that a new vm has been initialized.

cleanUp

public void cleanUp(boolean forceCleanup)
Finalize the application if that has not been done before and clean up its memory footprint after doing so.

Parameters:
forceCleanup - If set to true, a cleanup will be done even if this method has already been run.

finalizeApplication

public void finalizeApplication()
Finalize execution in this application.

finalize

public void finalize()
Finalize and clean up this application if that has not been done, yet.

Overrides:
finalize in class java.lang.Object
